LOGIN.TITLE: [Fr]-Epilogue Systems LLC
LOGIN.USERNAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Your eMail address must have at least 3 characters
LOGIN.USERNAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Your eMail must have 50 characters or less.

ACCOUNT_INFO.ACCOUNT_NAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Account Name must have at least 3 characters.
ACCOUNT_INFO.ACCOUNT_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Account Name must have 50 characters or less.
ACCOUNT_INFO.ZIPCODE_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Zip Code must have at least 5 characters.
ACCOUNT_INFO.ZIPCODE_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Zip Code must have 9 characters or less.
ACCOUNT_INFO.TITLE: [Fr]-Drag and Drop to Upload Your Logo
ACCOUNT_INFO.ACCOUNT_CANCELATION_BODY: [Fr]-We are sorry to hear that you no longer wish to use Opus. Please allow us to address your concerns by contacting our support team at the number below to continue with your account cancellation:
ACCOUNT_INFO.PHONE_INVALID: [Fr]-Phone number must be a 10 digit number (XXX-XXX-XXXX).

PHONE-NUMBER.PHONE_INVALID: [Fr]-Phone number must be a 10 digit number (XXX-XXX-XXXX).

USER-PROFILE.FIRST_NAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-First Name must be at least 3 characters.
USER-PROFILE.FIRST_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-First Name must have 20 characters or less.
USER-PROFILE.LAST_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Last Name must have 20 characters or less.
USER-PROFILE.PROFILE_IMAGE_TITLE: [Fr]-Drag and Drop to Upload Your Profile Image

BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.FA_DESCRIPTION_1: [Fr]-Full access to the Authoring and Editing tools.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.FA_DESCRIPTION_2: [Fr]-Create and manage Projects and Tasks with detailed workflow.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.FA_DESCRIPTION_3: [Fr]-Includes Advisor access for context specific suggestions.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.CE_1: [Fr]-Includes all document creation and editing tools.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.ENTER_NUMBER_USERS: [Fr]-Please enter the number of users (blocks of 10)
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.VALUE_MULTIPLE_OF_10: [Fr]-Please enter a value that is a multiple of 10
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.PLAN_NOTE: [Fr]-*Please note that users subscriptions will be charged in blocks of 10. Your bill will reflect the cost for your current number of users rounded up to the nearest 10.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.INVOICE_NOTE_1: [Fr]-By Choosing the invoice method, you agree to receive a yearly invoice from Epilogue for your subscription. Invoices must be settled within 15 days of the invoice date or your accounnt will be subject to suspension and termination.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.INVOICE_NOTE_2: [Fr]-In order to issue you a yearly invoice, we require a valid payment method on file. This method will not be charged for your recurring services.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.CREDIT_NUMBER_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Card Number is invalid, please reenter the number on the card.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.CREDIT_NUMBER_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Card Number is invalid, please reenter the number on the card.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.ACH_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Account Owner must have 50 characters or less.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.ACH_NAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Account Owner must have at least 30 characters.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.BILLING_ZIP_CODE_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Zip Code must have 10 characters or less.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.UPDATE_PLAN_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: [Fr]-Updated Plan successful. Please re-login the Opus to get new permission for selected Plan.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.MSG_SUCCESS_UPDATE_BILL_PLAN: [Fr]-Plan and Billing Info has been successfully changed.
BILL-PLAN-INFORMATION.CANCELLATION_NOTIFICATION: [Fr]-Your account has been marked as canceled. If you wish to resume service, please update your billing information and click restore

NEW_PASSWORD.TITLE: [Fr]-New Password
NEW_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INVALID: [Fr]-The password must be: alpha numeric, at least one number, and one upper case letter.

AUDIT_LOG.TITLE: [Fr]-ACTIVITY LOGS
AUDIT_LOG.LOGS_DESCRIPTION_BEGIN: [Fr]-Search below to view activity for any customer in the last
AUDIT_LOG.LOGS_DESCRIPTION_END: [Fr]-days an archive format will be provided via email.
AUDIT_LOG.DOWNLOAD_CONFIRM_MSG_BEGIN: [Fr]-The date range selected includes activity logs that are older than
AUDIT_LOG.DOWNLOAD_CONFIRM_MSG_END: [Fr]-days and have been archived. To retrieve these logs, we will email you a temporary link to download the .csv file.
AUDIT_LOG.ERR_MSG_DATE_TO_DATE: [Fr]-Start Date/time cannot be greater than or equal End Date/Time
AUDIT_LOG.MSG_NO_DATA_MATCHED: [Fr]-There is no data that match your request

ADMIN_CUSTOMERS.TITLE: [Fr]-CUSTOMERS
ADMIN_CUSTOMERS.ADD_A_CUSTOMER_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Enter the required account and user information to create a new account. You may optionaly choose a plan and enter payment information.

CUSTOMER_USER_LIST.TITLE: [Fr]-USER MANAGEMENT
CUSTOMER_USER_LIST.MSG_CONFIRM_ASSIGN_ACCOUNT_OWNER: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to assign account ownership to this Admin?

INVITE_USER.TITLE: [Fr]-INVITE USER
INVITE_USER.FIRST_NAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-First Name must be at least 3 characters.
INVITE_USER.FIRST_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-First Name must have 20 characters or less.
INVITE_USER.LAST_NAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Last Name must be at least 3 characters.
INVITE_USER.LAST_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Last Name must have 20 characters or less.
INVITE_USER.DEPARTMENT_REQUIRE: [Fr]-Content User must have at least 1 department.
INVITE_USER.INVITATION_NOTI_1: [Fr]-To join (Company Name) complete your user profile.
INVITE_USER.INVITATION_NOTI_2: [Fr]-Complete the information in each of the following steps to create your user profile.
INVITE_USER.APPLI_TIPS: [Fr]-Choose each application you'd like to add and click "Add Application". You can then indicate your level of knowledge (10 being an expert level) in the application and specify Functional Areas you specialize in.
INVITE_USER.UPLOAD_TITLE: [Fr]-Drag and Drop to Upload Your Logo
INVITE_USER.USERNAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Username is too long. It should have 50 characters or less.

REGISTER.TITLE: [Fr]-REGISTER
REGISTER.THANKS: [Fr]-Thanks for choosing Opus, powered by Epilogue Systems,LLC
REGISTER.REGISTER_TIPS: [Fr]-Complete the information in each of the following steps to create your Opus account.
REGISTER.ACCOUNT_NAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Account Name must have at least 3 characters.
REGISTER.ACCOUNT_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Account Name must have 50 characters or less.
REGISTER.COMPANY_DOMAIN_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Company Domain must have at least 3 characters.
REGISTER.COMPANY_DOMAIN_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Company Domain must have 50 characters or less.
REGISTER.ZIPCODE_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Zip Code must have at least 5 characters or more.
REGISTER.ZIPCODE_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Zip Code must have 9 characters or less.
REGISTER.PHONE_INVALID: [Fr]-Phone number must be a 10 digit number (XXX-XXX-XXXX).
REGISTER.ACCOUNT_LOGO_TITLE: [Fr]-Drag and Drop to Upload Your Logo
REGISTER.FREE_DAYS_DYNAMIC_LIMIT: [Fr]-After your %%trialPeriod%% day trial period you will be billed for your full plan price
REGISTER.FREE_DAYS_LIMIT: [Fr]-After your 60 day trial period you will be billed for your full plan price
REGISTER.FA_DESCRIPTION_1: [Fr]-Full access to the Authoring and Editing tools.
REGISTER.FA_DESCRIPTION_2: [Fr]-Create and manage Projects and Tasks with detailed workflow.
REGISTER.FA_DESCRIPTION_3: [Fr]-Includes Advisor access for context specific suggestions.
REGISTER.CE_DESCRIPTION_1: [Fr]-Includes all document creation and editing tools.
REGISTER.ENTER_NUMBER_USERS: [Fr]-Please enter the number of users (blocks of 10)
REGISTER.PLAN_NOTE: [Fr]-*Please note that users subscriptions will be charged in blocks of 10 users. Your bill will reflect the cost for your current number of users rounded up to the nearest 10.
REGISTER.INVOICE_NOTE_1: [Fr]-By Choosing the invoice method, you agree to receive a yearly invoice from Epilogue for your subscription. Invoices must be settled within 15 days of the invoice date or your accounnt will be subject to suspension and termination.
REGISTER.INVOICE_NOTE_2: [Fr]-In order to issue you a yearly invoice, we require a valid payment method on file. This method will not be charged for your recurring services.
REGISTER.CREDIT_NUMBER_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Card Number is invalid, please reenter the number on the card.
REGISTER.CREDIT_NUMBER_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Card Number is invalid, please reenter the number on the card.
REGISTER.DEPARTMENTS_TIPS: [Fr]-Type in the name of each department you'd like to add or choose from our suggestion. You must add least 1 department.
REGISTER.DEPARTMENT_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Department name must have at least 2 characters.
REGISTER.DEPARTMENT_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Department name must have 50 characters or less.
REGISTER.APPLI_TIPS: [Fr]-Type in the name of each application you'd like to add or choose from the list. You can then highlight each item and add Functional Areas and Sub-Areas as needed. The Application must have at least one Function Area.
REGISTER.REGISTER_COMPLETE_NOTI_2: [Fr]-Verify account to login and get started.
REGISTER.REGISTER_COMPLETE_NOTI_3: [Fr]-An email has been sent to verify account, please follow the link provided to finish registration. After verification, you'll be able to login and begin using Opus.
REGISTER.USER_EMAIL_NOT_CONFIRMED: [Fr]-Your account has not yet been confirmed. Please check your email.
REGISTER.PROFILE_IMAGE_TITLE: [Fr]-Drag and Drop to Upload Your Profile Image
REGISTER.VALUE_MULTIPLE_OF_10: [Fr]-Please enter a value that is a multiple of 10
REGISTER.MSG_APPLICATION_FUNCTIONAL_NEEDED: [Fr]-You must have at least one Application and one Function Area.
REGISTER.ACH_BILLING_INFO_ERROR_MSG: [Fr]-We were unable to verify your Bank Accounts at this time: %%detail_error%%. Please try again.
REGISTER.CREDIT_BILLING_INFO_ERROR_MSG: [Fr]-We were unable to verify your Credit Card at this time: %%detail_error%%. Please try again.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: [Fr]-FORGOT PASSWORD
FORGOT_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Enter your registered email address and a link will be sent to reset your password.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.EMAIL_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-eMail Address must have 256 characters or less.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.INFO_PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: [Fr]-You have successfully reset your password. You may now use this new passsword to login to Opus.

SEND_MAIL_FORGOT.TITLE: [Fr]-Request Send
SEND_MAIL_FORGOT.DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Enter your registered email address and a link will be sent to reset your password.

DEPARTMENT.TITLE: [Fr]-DEPARTMENTS
DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENTS_TIPS: [Fr]-Type in the name of each department you'd like to add or choose from our suggestions. You must add at least 1 department.
DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Department name must have at least 2 characters.
DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Department name must have 50 characters or less.
DEPARTMENT.REMOVE_USER_MSG: [Fr]-Are you sure to remove this user from this department?
DEPARTMENT.REMOVE_DEPARTMENT_MSG: [Fr]-Are you sure to remove this department?
DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_IS_USED_PROJECT: [Fr]-This department has been used by another project!
DEPARTMENT.MSG_WARNING_DELETE_LAST_ITEM: [Fr]-At least one department is required for your account. Please add a new department to remove the existing one.
DEPARTMENT.MSG_WARNING_DELETE_LAST_ITEM_ADMIN: [Fr]-At least one Department is required for your account. Please add a new Department to replace the existing Department.
DEPARTMENT.MSG_WARNING_EMPTY: [Fr]-Your company doesn't have any new Departments at this time, please contact your Admin to add new ones.
DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENTS_TIPS_HOST: [Fr]-Type in the name of each department you'd like to add.

TEAM_LIST.TITLE: [Fr]-Project Teams
TEAM_LIST.DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Manage your project teams below. Once a team is created, you can add it to any new project by selecting the team name.

MY_TASKS.TITLE: [Fr]-MY TASKS
MY_TASKS.DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-All your Tasks across every project is listed below. Use the search and filter functionality to quickly find a specific task.

TASK_DETAIL.TASK_QUEUE_MSG: [Fr]-This task has been queued in Opus Recorder.
TASK_DETAIL.UPDATE_STATE_SUCCESS: [Fr]-The task state has been successfully updated
TASK_DETAIL.UPDATE_DOCUMENT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: [Fr]-By uploading a new document to this task, the existing document in the task will be discarded. Would you like to proceed?
TASK_DETAIL.RECORDING_DOCUMENT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: [Fr]-By creating new recording to this task, the existing document in the task will be discarded. Would you like to proceed?
TASK_DETAIL.EXIST_DOCUMENT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: [Fr]-Updating another existing document to this task, the existing document in the task will be discarded. Would you like to proceed?
TASK_DETAIL.OVERRIDE_STEP_FROM_LIB: [Fr]-Do you want overwrite the matching steps using existing steps from your library?
TASK_DETAIL.OVERRIDE_STEP_TO_LIB: [Fr]-Do you wish to update the step library with matching steps you created in this document?
TASK_DETAIL.PUBLISH_NO_CONTENT_ERROR_MSG: [Fr]-There is no content associated to this task. Please create a recording, choose an existing document, or upload a document in order to publish.
TASK_DETAIL.MSG_DUPLICATED_DOCUMENT: [Fr]-The content you are publishing has the same title as an existing document in Production. Please change the name.
TASK_DETAIL.EXIST_IMPORT_RECORDING_MSG: [Fr]-By importing a new recording document to this task, the existing document in the task will be discarded. Would you like to proceed?
TASK_DETAIL.IMPORT_RECORDING_UNMATCH_FILE: [Fr]-Must select recording file with extension rstx.

TASK_EDIT.TITLE: [Fr]-EDIT TASK
TASK_EDIT.CONFIRM_MSG: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to leave this page?
TASK_EDIT.DUE_DATE_INVALID: [Fr]-Due date must be greater or equal than today.
TASK_EDIT.TRANSLATE_CONFIRM_MSG: [Fr]-You've chosen a new language for this task. All language within the task and document will be translated to your selected language. Are you sure you want to translate this task?

PROJECT.NOT_ASSOCIATED_PROJECT: [Fr]-You are not associated to an Opus Project at this time.
PROJECT.SUB_TITLE_EDIT: [Fr]-Please note that some fields may not be editable due to existing tasks.
PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Project name must have at least 3 characters.
PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Project name must have 50 characters or less.
PROJECT.PROJECT_NAME_TEXT: [Fr]-Project name can only contain numbers or letters.
PROJECT.APPLI_TIPS_1: [Fr]-Choose an Application to add your Project below. You can then add Functional Areas and Sub-Areas to each application.
PROJECT.APPLI_TIPS_2: [Fr]-To configure new Applications, Functional Areas, and Sub-Areas, please visits your account settings.
PROJECT.DEPART_REQUIRE: [Fr]-You must add at least one department.
PROJECT.APPLI_REQUIRE: [Fr]-You must add at least one application.
PROJECT.DUE_DATE_INVALID: [Fr]-Due date must be greater or equal than today.
PROJECT.CONFIRM_MSG: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to leave this page?
PROJECT.PROJECT_TEAM_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Choose a team you've previously configured for this project or select team by adding members from the list below. All projects require a Project Admin at a minimum.
PROJECT.ADD_TEAM_MEMBERS_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Select content users from the list to add them to the team.
PROJECT.ARCHIVE_MESSAGE_CONTENT: [Fr]-If you choose to archive this project, all tasks and associated content that has not been published will be discarded. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to close and archive this project?
PROJECT.NOT_ASSIGNED_PROJECT: [Fr]-You are not assigned to this project

RECORDER.AREA_CONFIGURE_TITLE: [Fr]-To start recording, first select the area of your screen to capture then click the record button below.
RECORDER.ALL_SCREENS_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Records the active window on all monitors.

TASK_CREATE.TITLE: [Fr]-CREATE NEW TASK
TASK_CREATE.TASK_NAME_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Task name must have 128 characters or less.
TASK_CREATE.TASK_DESCRIPTION_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Task description must have at least 3 characters.
TASK_CREATE.DEPART_REQUIRE: [Fr]-You must add at least one department.
TASK_CREATE.APPLI_REQUIRE: [Fr]-You must add at least one application.
TASK_CREATE.DUE_DATE_INVALID: [Fr]-Due date must be greater or equal than today.
TASK_CREATE.CONFIRM_MSG: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to leave this page?
TASK_CREATE.IMPORT_RECORDING_UNMATCH_FILE: [Fr]-Must select recording file with extension rstx.
TASK_CREATE.IMPORT_RECORDING_FAILED_WITH_UNKNOWN_ERR: [Fr]-The file you attempted to import failed due to "Unknown Reasons"
TASK_CREATE.CONFIRM_TRANSLATE_MSG_CONTENT: [Fr]-You've chosen a new language for this task. All language within the task and document will be translated to your selected language. Are you sure you want to translate this task?

TASK_DELETE.TITLE: [Fr]-DELETE THIS TASK
TASK_DELETE.CONTENT: [Fr]-If you choose to delete this task, all content and associated issues will be discarded.
TASK_DELETE.CONTENT_CONFIRM: [Fr]-This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this task?

UNCLAIMED_TASKS.TITLE: [Fr]-UNCLAIMED TASKS
UNCLAIMED_TASKS.DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-All the tasks available to your role that have not yet been assigned, will appear in the list below. Claim one or more tasks by checking the box and then clicking “Claim Selected Tasks”. Claimed tasks will be appear in the My Tasks list. Use search and filter to quickly find a specific task.

ADD_TASK_ISSUE.TITLE: [Fr]-ADD AN ISSUE
ADD_TASK_ISSUE.SUB_TITLE: [Fr]-Describe the issue you are seeing in detail below.
ADD_TASK_ISSUE.DESC_MINLENGTH: [Fr]-Issue Description must have at least 3 characters
ADD_TASK_ISSUE.DESC_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Issue Description must have 512 characters or less.

TEAM.TEAM_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Manage your project teams below. Once a team is created you can quickly assign it to any new project.
TEAM.MSG_CONFIRM_DELETE_TEAM: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to delete this team?
TEAM.TITLE_TEAM_ADD_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Create a new project team by choosing existing content users to fill each role. This team can then be selected when creating a project.
TEAM.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: [Fr]-Team Name must have at least 3 characters.
TEAM.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: [Fr]-Team Name must have 50 characters or less.
TEAM.ADD_TEAM_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Select content users from the list to add them to the team.
TEAM.PROJECT_ADMIN_REQUIRED: [Fr]-Each team must have a Project Admin.
TEAM.MSG_CONFIRM_LEAVE_PAGE: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to leave this page?
TEAM.TITLE_TEAM_EDIT_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Edit a project team by add/remove existed content users to fill each role. This team can then be selected when creating a project.
TEAM.TITLE_PROJECT_TEAM_EDIT_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Choose a team you've previously configured for this project or manually add new members to your team. Team members currently assigned to a task in the project cannot be removed.

DOCUMENT_TASK.TITLE: [Fr]-CHOOSE EXISTING DOCUMENT
DOCUMENT_TASK.SUB_TITLE: [Fr]-Select an existing document from your previously published items to make edits. If the document selected is in a different language, it will be translated to the task language automatically.

DOCUMENT_TASK.OVERRIDE_STEP_TO_LIB: [Fr]-Do you wish to update the step library with matching steps you created in this document?

CONTENTS.CONTENTS_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Search below to view all published contents.

CATEGORY.TITLE: [Fr]-CATEGORY
CATEGORY.SMALL_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Type in the name of each application you'd like to add or choose from our suggestions. You can then highlight each item and add Functional Areas and Sub-Areas as needed.
CATEGORY.MSG_ERR_DELETE_CATEGORY: [Fr]-There is an error when deleting category
CATEGORY.CONFIRM_NODE_HAS_CHILD: [Fr]-This level contains one or more sub-levels. Removing it will also remove these sub-levels and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to remove this level?
CATEGORY.CONFIRM_REMOVE_NODE: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to remove this level?
CATEGORY.CATEGORY_IS_IN_USED: [Fr]-Category or its children is in used by project.
CATEGORY.MSG_ONE_APP_REQUIRED: [Fr]-At least one Application is required for your account. Please add a new Application below to replace your existing application.
CATEGORY.TITLE_APP_REQUIRED: [Fr]-The Application must have at least one Function Area. Please add a new Functional Area before removing the old one.
CATEGORY.CONFIRM_CANCEL: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to cancel? All data you have changed will be lost and cannot be undone.
CATEGORY.MSG_WARNING_DELETE_LAST_ITEM: [Fr]-At least one application is required for your account. Please add a new application to remove the existing one.
CATEGORY.NAME: [Fr]-Name
CATEGORY.TITLE_APP_REQUIRED_SAVE: [Fr]-The Application must have at least one Function Area.
CATEGORY.MSG_ONE_APP_REQUIRED_DOCUMENT: [Fr]-At least one Application is required for this document(s). Please add a new Application before saving changes.
CATEGORY.CATEGORY_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Application name is too long. It should have 50 characters or less.

DIALOG_NEW_RECORD.TITLE: [Fr]-START YOUR RECORDING
DIALOG_NEW_RECORD.CONTENT_MESSAGE: [Fr]-This task has been queued for you in Opus Recorder. Launch the Opus Recorder to load the task and begin your recording. If you don't have Opus Recorder, please download it below, then launch the application and sign in.
DIALOG_NEW_RECORD.NOT_SHOW_MSG: [Fr]-Do not display the message in the future

ELEMENT_LIST.REMOVE_STEP_WARNING: [Fr]-All elements within step will be also removed after deleting the selected step. Do you want to continue?
ELEMENT_LIST.SAVE_TASK_SUCCEEDED_MSG: [Fr]-List element document of this task is saved successfully
ELEMENT_LIST.SAVE_TASK_UNSUCCEEDED_MSG: [Fr]-List element document of this task NOT SAVE!
ELEMENT_LIST.TITLE_CANT_ADD_MSG: [Fr]-Title element cannot be added as a sub element
ELEMENT_LIST.TITLE_ADDED_MSG: [Fr]-Title element has been added to top step elements
ELEMENT_LIST.FOOTER_CANT_ADD_MSG: [Fr]-Footer element cannot be added as a sub element
ELEMENT_LIST.FOOTER_ADDED_MSG: [Fr]-Footer element has been add to bottom step elements
ELEMENT_LIST.HEADER_CANT_ADD_TO_SUB_MSG: [Fr]-Header element cannot be added as a sub element
ELEMENT_LIST.HEADER_ADDED_MSG: [Fr]-Header element has been add to bottom step elements
ELEMENT_LIST.HEADER_CANT_ADD_TO_STEP_MSG: [Fr]-Cannot add header element to step elements
ELEMENT_LIST.NOTE_ADDED_MSG: [Fr]-Note element has been add to this step element
ELEMENT_LIST.NOTE_CANT_ADD_MSG: [Fr]-Note element cannot be added to this step element
ELEMENT_LIST.NOTE_ADDED_TO_LIST_MSG: [Fr]-Note element has been add to list step elements
ELEMENT_LIST.NOTE_CANT_ADD_TO_LIST_MSG: [Fr]-Note element cannot be added to list step elements
ELEMENT_LIST.CONFIRM_DELETE_CONTENT_MSG: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to delete this content?

DOCUMENT_RESTORE_LIST.TITLE: [Fr]-TITLE
DOCUMENT_RESTORE_LIST.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: [Fr]-The version you selected will be restored and immediately available to content users. Are you sure you want to proceed?
DOCUMENT_RESTORE_LIST.CONFIRM_REPLACE_MESSAGE: [Fr]-Restoring this version will replace current edits in the content. Do you wish to proceed?
DOCUMENT_RESTORE_LIST.INSTRUCTION: [Fr]-Contents that are restored in this page are NOT immediately added to Production for users to view. They will create an Admin branch and may be edited and published to Production from the Media Manager tool.
DOCUMENT_RESTORE_LIST.DUPLICATE_TITLE_DETECTED_MSG: [Fr]-The Title of this Document version is already in use. Please enter a new title for this document.

AUTHORING.NO_ACTION_WARNING: [Fr]-There is no corresponding action for this control

DOCUMENT_SETTINGS.DOCUMENT_SETTINGS_SUBTITLE: [Fr]-Choose the Doctypes you would lick available for viewing documents. One doctype is required. For each doctype selected, you can configure your document using the available settings.
DOCUMENT_SETTINGS.DOCUMENT_SETTINGS_REQUIRED: [Fr]-One doctype is required for the account, so you cannot uncheck the last one. Please check another doctype before unchecking it.
DOCUMENT_SETTINGS.DOCUMENT_SETTINGS_EXISTS: [Fr]-This doctype can not be un-selected because you have one or more documents in production or active projects/tasks that only use this doctype. Please modify these documents or projects/tasks and try again.
DOCUMENT_SETTINGS.LANGUAGE_SETTINGS_EXISTS: [Fr]-This language can not be un-selected because you have one or more documents in production or active projects/tasks that only use this language. Please modify these documents or projects/tasks and try again.

IMPORT_DOCUMENTS.TITLE: [Fr]-IMPORT DOCUMENTS
IMPORT_DOCUMENTS.DRAG_AND_DROP_FILES: [Fr]-Drag and Drop to Upload Your Existing Documents
IMPORT_DOCUMENTS.OR_USE_FILE_MANAGER: [Fr]-or click to select using the file manager
IMPORT_DOCUMENTS.FILE_TOO_LARGE: [Fr]-File "{0}" is too large. Maximum file size is 100MB

AUDIO_RECORDING.HELPER_MSG: [Fr]-Click here to record audio or upload an audio file.
AUDIO_RECORDING.AUDIO_MUST_MP3_FILE: [Fr]-Your file must be Audio with type is MP3.
AUDIO_RECORDING.AUDIO_MAX_SIZE_MSG: [Fr]-Your upload file must be smaller than

SIMULATION_SETTING.TITLE: [Fr]-Configure your simulations
SIMULATION_SETTING.DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Choose the settings you would like for your Simulation Doctypes. These settings will apply to all existing and future documents

ADVISOR.TITLE: [Fr]-Advisor
ADVISOR.INTRODUCTION: [Fr]-Suggested documents based upon the context of your last matching activity will be suggested below.
ADVISOR.DOWNLOAD_INTRODUCTION: [Fr]-To get suggestions from Advisor, please install the Advisor listener.

DOCUMENT_CREATE.DOCUMENT_TITLE_MAXLENGTH: [Fr]-Document title is too long. It must have 128 characters or less.
DOCUMENT_CREATE.DUPLICATE_TITLE: [Fr]-Document title is already exist. Please enter other document title.
DOCUMENT_CREATE.LEAVE_CONFIRM_MSG: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to leave this page?
DOCUMENT_CREATE.EDIT_MSG_DOCTYPE_REQUIRED_ONE: [Fr]-This doctype can not be un-selected because you have one only use on this document.
DOCUMENT_CREATE.EDIT_MSG_LANGUAGE_REQUIRED_ONE: [Fr]-This language can not be un-selected because you have one only use on this document.

DOCUMENT_TITLE_EDIT.MSG_DUPLICATED_DOCUMENT: [Fr]-The content you are publishing has the same title as an existing document in Production. Please change the name.

BILLING_SETTINGS.LANGUAGE_SMALL_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Set the default pricing per language for all customers.
BILLING_SETTINGS.YEARLY_DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-% off for Yearly Payment per Seat
BILLING_SETTINGS.DOCUMENT_PRICE_SMALL_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Set the default price to charge for each document that is translated.
BILLING_SETTINGS.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_CANCEL: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to cancel? All data you have changed will be deleted and cannot be restored.
BILLING_SETTINGS.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_SAVE: [Fr]-Update the default language pricing will affect all customers that do not have a custom price set. These changes will take effect immediately for new customers and at the beginning of the next billing period.
BILLING_SETTINGS.PLAN_PRICING_SMALL_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Edit the name, description, permissions and price for the selected plan.
BILLING_SETTINGS.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_PLAN_SAVE: [Fr]-Note: If the default plan pricing was updated, this will affect all customers that do not have a custom price set. These changes will take effect immediately for new customers and at the beginning of the next billing period for existing users.
BILLING_SETTINGS.PATTERN_PERCENTAGE_MSG: [Fr]-A valid range should be from 0 to 100.
BILLING_SETTINGS.CONFIRM_CUSTOMER_MESSAGE_SAVE: [Fr]-Update the  language pricing for this customer will take affect immediately for any new language or translation and at the beginning of the next billing cycle for languages already added.
BILLING_SETTINGS.CUSTOMER_LANGUAGE_SMALL_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Set custom language pricing for only this customer. Any changes will be applied to the next invoice due.
BILLING_SETTINGS.CUSTOMER_BILLING_OPTIONS_SMALL_DESCRIPTI: [Fr]-Set the number of days allowed to settle an account prior to suspension after a failed payment.
BILLING_SETTINGS.MSG_ERR_SAVE: [Fr]-The application has encountered an error. Please try again.

F.PATTERN_YEARLY_END_DATE_MSG: [Fr]-A valid range should be from 1 to 365.
F.YEARLY_BILLING_END_DATE_SMALL_TITLE: [Fr]-Set the number of days to send the yearly billing invoice reminder prior to the end of the period.
F.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_CUSTOMER_PLAN_SAVE: [Fr]-Update the plan pricing for this customer will take affect immediately for any new plans and at the beginning of the next billing cycle for plan already added.
F.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_BILLING_EMAIL_OPTIONS: [Fr]-Update billing email options will affect all customers. These changes will take effect immediately for new customers and at the beginning of the next billing period for existing users.
F.SET_ACCESS_SUBTITLE: [Fr]-Set what access comes with this plan by checking/unchecking the available options.
F.PLAN_SET_PRICING_SMALL_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Set the default prices for this plan.
F.PLAN_MANAGEMENT_SMALL_TITLE: [Fr]-Manage the plans available to Opus customer including plan access and pricing.
F.NOTICE_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED_MESSAGE: [Fr]-Your account has been suspended. Please contact our billing department here.
F.OVERDUE_PAYMENT_GRACE_PERIOD_SMALL_TITLE: [Fr]-Set the number of days allowed to settle an account prior to suspension after a failed payment.
F.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_CUSTOMER_PLAN_SAVE_CUSTO: [Fr]-Update the plan pricing for this customer will take affect immediately for any new plans and at the beginning of the next billing cycle for plan already added.
F.PATTERN_GRACE_PERIOD_MSG: [Fr]-A valid range should be from 0 to 365.
F.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_SUSPENDE: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to suspend
F.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_REINSTATE: [Fr]-Are you sure you want to reinstate
F.PATTERN_CANCELLATION_PERIOD_MSG: [Fr]-A valid range should be from 0 to 365.
F.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_CANCELLATION_CUSTOMER: [Fr]-This action will cancel the account of customer {0}. Their data will be maintained for {1} day(s) before the account is permanently removed from the system. Are you sure you wish to continue?
F.CANCELLATION_ACCOUNT_SETTING_MESSAGE: [Fr]-Set the number of days to retain customer data before the account is permanently deleted.
F.NOTICE_TENANT_SUSPENDED_IN_PERIOD_MESSAG: [Fr]-Your latest Billing Payment was NOT processed successfully. Please update your Payment information as soon as possible to avoid Account Suspension.
F.NOTICE_TENANT_SUSPENDED_NOT_IN_PERIOD_ME: [Fr]-Your account has been suspended because your latest payment has failed. Please update your payment information or contact our Billing Department in order to continue accessing Opus.
F.API_ACCESS_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Add Opus to your application and get your document from our API.

SELECT_LANGUAGES.LANGUAGES_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Choose the languages you would like available for authoring documents. One languages is included in your plan. Additional languages may result in an increased monthly charge.

CLONE_TASK_DIALOG.CLONE_TASK_DESCRIPTION: [Fr]-Choose a language and a new title for the cloned task. Any existing document will be translated to your new language if applicable.
CLONE_TASK_DIALOG.CONFIRM_MSG: [Fr]-You've chosen a new language for this task. All language within the task and document will be translated to your selected language. Are you sure you want to translate this task?

VIDEO_ELEMENT.HELPER_MSG: [Fr]-Click here to embed a Youtube or Vimeo Video.

GETTING_STARTED.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_NEXT_STEP_APPLICATIONS: [Fr]-In order to add applications to your system once you have logged on successfully, go to Settings > Applications to complete this process. Press OK to Skip this step.
GETTING_STARTED.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_NEXT_STEP_DEPARTMENTS: [Fr]-You must have at least one department setup in order to invite users to participate in Opus. Once you have logged on successfully, go to Settings > Departments to complete this process. Press OK to Skip this step.
GETTING_STARTED.CONFIRM_MESSAGE_NEXT_STEP_INVITE_USERS: [Fr]-In order to invite users to your system once you have logged on successfully, go to Settings > User Management to complete this process. Press OK to Skip this step.
GETTING_STARTED.GETTING_STARTED_TIPS: [Fr]-To begin documenting your applications, you'll need to establish at least one application and department. If you don't want to do this now, you can always access  these in your settings.
GETTING_STARTED.MESSAGE_FORCE_NEXT_STEP_INVITE_USERS: [Fr]-You can't invite users if you don't have any select any departments.

USER_GETTING_STARTED.GETTING_STARTED_INFO_CONTENT: [Fr]-To begin documenting your applications, you'll need to establish at least one application and department. If you don't want to do this now, you can always access these in your settings.
USER_GETTING_STARTED.NOTIFY_ADD_APPLICATION: [Fr]-You must have at least one app setup in order. Once you have logged on successfully, go to Settings > Applications to complete this process.
USER_GETTING_STARTED.NOTIFY_ADD_DEPARTMENTS: [Fr]-You must have at least one department setup in order. Once you have logged on successfully, go to Settings > Departments to complete this process.

UPLOAD_CUSTOM_IMAGE.TITLE: [Fr]-UPLOAD CUSTOM IMAGE
UPLOAD_CUSTOM_IMAGE.UPLOAD_IMAGE_DESC: [Fr]-Drag & Drop your new image or click to choose an image.

MULTIPLE_CHOICE_QUIZ.HELPER_MSG: [Fr]-Click to configure your Multiple Choice or Multiple Mark Question.

FILL_IN_THE_BLANK_QUIZ.HELPER_MSG: [Fr]-Click to configure your Fill in the Blank Question.
FILL_IN_THE_BLANK_QUIZ.FILL_IN_THE_BLANK_DESC: [Fr]-Drag the correct answer to each blank above
FILL_IN_THE_BLANK_QUIZ.FILL_IN_THE_BLANK_VIEW_DESC: [Fr]-Drag the correct answer to each blank below
FILL_IN_THE_BLANK_QUIZ.REQUIRE: [Fr]-You must have a question and answers for the element to be considered complete.

CONTENT_SIMULATION_QUIZ_DISPLAY.TEST_RESULTS_DESC: [Fr]-Click the question from the step list to review your answers

API_SETTINGS.SEND_CONTEXT_TO_GET_HELP: [Fr]-Send the context from your application to Opus' API to get help documents.

DONWLOAD_DOCUMENT_OUTPUT.DOWNLOAD_SUBTITLE: [Fr]-Choose an output type to download your selected document.
DONWLOAD_DOCUMENT_OUTPUT.REQUIRE_SELECT: [Fr]-You have to select an output type first.
DONWLOAD_DOCUMENT_OUTPUT.NOT_RECORDING: [Fr]-Selected document does not have recording content to generate output.

BUILD_A_STEP.UPLOAD_IMAGE_DESC: [Fr]-Drag & Drop your new image or click to choose an image.
BUILD_A_STEP.TITLE: [Fr]-Edit Instructions
BUILD_A_STEP.LABEL: [Fr]-Label
BUILD_A_STEP.TYPE_WARNING: [Fr]-Your file must be Image with type is PNG or JPG
